sys_ux_client_script.name: set client state

sys_update_version.name: sys_ux_client_script_33fbc48687cfc1505f40cbb4dabb35cd
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Landing 5">e4ce5be81b03815093c1a685624bcb1b</macroponent><name>set client state</name><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[/**
* @param {params} params
* @param {api} params.api
* @param {any} params.event
* @param {any} params.imports
* @param {ApiHelpers} params.helpers
*/
function handler({api, event, helpers, imports}) {
    // Clear Client State
    api.setState("now_serving", "");
    api.setState("first_in_queue", "");
    // Assign new values
    api.setState("now_serving", api.data.look_up_records_1.results[0].sys_id.value);
    api.setState("first_in_queue", api.data.look_up_records_2.results[0].sys_id.value);
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>steve.mccluskey</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-25 04:51:42</sys_created_on><sys_id>33fbc48687cfc1505f40cbb4dabb35cd</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>set client state</sys_name><sys_package display_value="CreatorCon 22 - SN Train" source="x_snc_creatorcon_0">3570fa5587ca0110a34aecad3fbb35e0</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="CreatorCon 22 - SN Train">3570fa5587ca0110a34aecad3fbb35e0</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_33fbc48687cfc1505f40cbb4dabb35cd</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>steve.mccluskey</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-04-25 05:04:42</sys_updated_on><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
